item.title: Winter Of Our Disconnect
item.description:
The Challenges of Disconnection in the Digital Age While we live in an era defined by instant communication, it’s crucial for businesses to prepare for disruptions. This is similar to the wisdom of anticipating challenges, even during seemingly stable times. Take, for instance, the recent incident in the Mediterranean where several underwater cables were severed. This caused significant internet outages in Egypt and India, with slower speeds experienced across Europe and Asia...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/winter-of-our-disconnect/
